short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skips video ads and closes banner ads on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Ad Skip will automatically skip video ads and close pop-up banner ads on YouTube videos. 

            ✔️ No longer have to wait 5 seconds to skip ads. 
            ✔️ Auto skip ads that play mid-video.  
            ✔️ Continuously play YouTube videos with fewer interruptions.  
            ✔️ Quickly close overlay ads that block view. 
            ✔️ No user action required once extension is installed.

This is not an ad blocker and there will be some ads that can't be skipped.
Please contact me with any issues.
